sentences.english: He felt drowsy when he was listening to music.
sentences.chinese: 当他听音乐时，他感到困倦。

sentences.english: A sleeping direwolf raised his head to snarl at empty air.
sentences.chinese: 一只困倦的冰原狼抬头看着空气。

sentences.english: One should never succumb to fatigue when alone on the battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 一个士兵永远不该在战场上屈服于困倦。

sentences.english: Nothing could dispel the torpidity of the indifferent audience.
sentences.chinese: 任何东西都无法驱散那些冷漠观众的困倦。

sentences.english: The sombre-feathered great bird sleepily merciless between them.
sentences.chinese: 暗色羽毛的巨鸟在这两者之间困倦。

sentences.english: R67:Vapours may cause drowsiness and dizziness.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽可能引起困倦和眩晕。

sentences.english: The major adverse reactions of trazodone were lassitude and dizziness.
sentences.chinese: 曲唑酮主要的不良反应是困倦和头晕。

sentences.english: He never appears sleepy and tired in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 在教室里，他从没有显得困倦或是疲惫。

sentences.english: It’s best scheduled for the afternoon when people tend to get a bit drowsy.
sentences.chinese: 最好安排在下午，这时人们往往有些困倦。

sentences.english: Some doctors believe hidden food allergies can make you sleepy.
sentences.chinese: 一些医生认为潜在的食物过敏可能会引起困倦。

sentences.english: Lay down your sweet and weary head.
Vapours may cause drowsiness and dizziness.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽可能引起困倦和眩晕。

sentences.english: The frequent interruptions of deep sleep leads to excessive daytime fatigue and sleepiness.
sentences.chinese: 这样频繁的打断睡眠会导致白天额外的疲劳和困倦。

sentences.english: The ensuing drop in body temperature will naturally initiate drowsiness and sleep.
sentences.chinese: 随之而来的是体内温度下降，自然会导致困倦和睡眠。

sentences.english: Seated in a window was a young man named Eutychus, who was sinking into a deep sleep as Paul talked on and on.
sentences.chinese: 有一个少年人，名叫犹推古，坐在窗台上，困倦沉睡。

definition: variant of 頭昏腦脹|头昏脑胀[tou2 hun1 nao3 zhang4]
